title: Swain RoA just happend
body:
Some items just synergize well with some champs.  DFG leblanc, duskblade zed.  But how about that new passive (eternity) of Rod of Ages on Swain.  I just had the pleasure of laning against one, and as per usual when doing so, engage with ignite or grievous wounds, or when he is low on mana.

1)  Can ignite really work on him now, before it was just a heal from his ult, however now he also has a heal from RoA
2)  With the new RoA, the more I attack him, the more mana he gets.  The more mana he gets, the more health he gains from his ult, and while spending mana on his ult, gains back more health.  

Such a vicious cycle :(  Any views on how to counter this guy atm?

replies.body: Ban him at champ select? I also feel he's pretty broken at the moment and especially hard to deal with. Forcing teams to take multiple ignites, build morello etc to deal with one person is a bit of a joke.
